summary: This function retrieves the value part of an entry in a map.
formals: is the key that identifies the entry.
returns: Return the value stored in the map entry that is identified by the given key.
example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val capitals = new TreeMap();%0A%0A    F::set(capitals, %22USA%22,    %22Washington%22);%0A    F::set(capitals, %22UK%22,     %22London%22);%0A    F::set(capitals, %22Canada%22, %22Ottawa%22);%0A%0A    val city1 = F::get(capitals, %22USA%22);%0A    val city2 = F::get(capitals, %22UK%22);%0A    val city3 = F::get(capitals, %22Canada%22);%0A    val city4 = F::get(capitals, %22Russia%22);%0A%0A    F::println(city1);%0A    F::println(city2);%0A    F::println(city3);%0A    F::println(city4);%0A}
Volcano #1: (Mount Rainier, USA)%0AVolcano #2: (Mount Baker, USA)%0AVolcano #3: (Mount St. Helens, USA)%0AVolcano #4: null
